title: Update failed error
body: everytime i open league it starts downloading but this wierd error shows up. I reinstalled but it didnt work and i tried many things. pls help i dont know what to do. Its not an update this is the first time i downloaded it

replies.body: This could be happening for a few reasons, depending on when it's happening and the specific error.  Let me know what the weird error says, and I'll see if we can figure this out.  Let me know!
